snippet: BEGUN--Martin. We are deeply saddened by the death of Martin Begun, our dear friend for over fifty years. He was devoted to his family and friends and committed to the well being of New York University, New York City and State. He was a devoted supporter of Israel and the extended Jewish community. He was an integral part of our family and his kindness, concern and quick wit will be missed every day by each of us. We extend our sympathy to Louise, the family and all of Martin's legion of friends. Laura and Lewis Kruger 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin. We are deeply saddened by the death of Martin Begun, our dear friend for over fifty years. He was devoted to his family and friends and committed to the well being of New York University, New York City and State. He was a devoted supporter of Israel and the extended Jewish community. He was an integral part of our family and his kindness, concern and quick wit will be missed every day by each of us. We extend our sympathy to Louise, the family and all of Martin's legion of friends. Laura and Lewis Kruger 1/3
